thread.section_title: Alaska Northern Lights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alaska Northern Lights | alaskanorthernlights.com
thread.title: Leah J Gail
thread.title_full: Alaska Northern Lights reviewed by Leah J Gail

author: Leah J Gail
title: Leah J Gail
text: I like the clean design of the light: it resembles my Macbook! The only thing I don't like about it is the fact that it requires an electric line, in fact a bulky AC/DC adaptor. I don't like to add more time sitting to my day. Also, it would be helpful if ideas or plans for making a stand for it were available from the manufacturer or users.
